venue.name: Waterville Valley Ski Touring Center, Town Square

item.description:
Hello. Conditions at Waterville Valley were ideal last weekend and snow is in the forecast for later this week. Let's meet at the Nordic Touring Center at 10 am and we can organize ourselves from there. I'll leave the Fenway about 7:30 am and have room for two passengers if you would like a ride (need to be back by 6:30 pm). Hope to see you there!
http://www.waterville.com/nordic/nordic-conditions.html

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Waterville Valley XC Ski
